messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

Sure, I'm happy to submit this but last I checked
package runtime didn't build on Plan 9.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7ea5398e65a5 ***

os, syscall: fix Plan 9 build

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5330067

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> once said:
> LGTM
> 
> Sure, I'm happy to submit this but last I checked
> package runtime didn't build on Plan 9.

Building on a Plan 9 machine or doing a cross
compile?  It builds fine for me on Linux with
GOOS set accordingly.

  Anthony

Anthony Martin <ality@pbrane.org> once said:
> Building on a Plan 9 machine or doing a cross
> compile?  It builds fine for me on Linux with
> GOOS set accordingly.

(At least with my nanotime CL.)

>   Anthony

I'll wait for the nanotime CL to be submitted before further comment.

Lucio.


On 11/8/11, Anthony Martin <ality@pbrane.org> wrote:
> Anthony Martin <ality@pbrane.org> once said:
>> Building on a Plan 9 machine or doing a cross
>> compile?  It builds fine for me on Linux with
>> GOOS set accordingly.
>
> (At least with my nanotime CL.)
>
>>   Anthony
>

subject: code review 5330067: os, syscall: fix Plan 9 build
